1111.title: Tom Holland

choices: He gets a call about an interesting movie
He's been kidnapped by a crazy fan
He feels normal and goes in to film
11111.content:
After coming home from the studio to take and retake many, many shots, Tom Holland was tired from another day at work. Most people would be envious of his position; fame, fortune, good looks and a bright future. He seemed to have it all. And he really did love it. But Tom was tired of going from studio to studio, film to film, and with his rise in popularity he felt rushed by it all. His home was his safe haven, where he was able to relax and not think about his acting career, though he did love it so. He just passed his current day off as a rough on.

"Peace and quiet." Tom said to himself as he walked in to his home. That was another thing he appreciated about his house: how serene it was compared to the studio. He loved how there wasn't anyone rushing him to get on set, how he could have a snack without being berated by someone for enjoying himself, or how there was constant noise. He was sure it was doing some kind of damage to his ears. He couldn't really complain, since most of said noise was necessary due to how much was going on in the studio.

So, this led Tom to sit down on the couch and act like he normally wouldn't; watching TV whilst eating a bag of chips and some donuts, downing it all with some soda. He wouldn't normally do this, but he really need to unwind after how long his day had been. After eating the bag of chips and two whole doughnuts, as well as half a liter of soda, Tom decided it was time to head up to bed. It was only 8:00, but he really felt like he needed to get some sleep after his day at the studio.

Tom basically fell asleep immediately, due to how stressed out he felt. When Tom wakes up…
11111.title: Long Day

choices: Play an obese character. He needed to gain lots of weight in time for filming.
Play an eating contest champion in a documentary,
Just lay around his house and eat junk food for months while they filmed.
111111.content:
Tom was quite surprised to be getting a phone call early in the morning just after he woke up. He didn't recognize the number, but at this point in his career, he was used to getting phone calls from unknown numbers. He picked up, and the person on the other side of the line said, "Is this Tom Holland? Don't hang up, I've got a gig for you!" and Tom said, "Yeah, it's Tom. What's this about a gig?" and the person said, "I'm making a movie with a role that you'd be perfect for, but it's gonna require you to make some life changes. It's a bit unorthodox in that way. I spoke to your agent, but she told me it'd be better to just contact you directly. You've got time to talk, right?"

Tom sighed and said, "Yeah, I don't film for a few hours." He didn't want to outright reject this gig but at the same time, he was getting a bit tired of his newfound fame. It meant that studio after studio was calling him to do movies. He liked the attention but hated all of the inevitable busy work. Even if he accepted only a small fraction of his offers, he'd still be stuck filming all day and would never really have time for himself. The person on the other line heard Tom's annoyed sigh and said, "Wait wait, the man responsible for this film is incredibly wealthy, and he really wants you. You name your price and we'll do it!" Tom said, "Really?" and the person added, "Yeah, we're offering a lot because you'd have to stop with all of your other movies." Tom thought about what that meant for his schedule, and how much time off that could give him. He said, "I'm listening. What's the movie about?" and soon Tom was talking to the person on the other line about the gig. As it turns out they want Tom to...
111111.title: An interesting movie

choices: Go eat out to get a head start
Go talk to the director and see what's up with the movie
Go outside, but saw a box of food was already on his doorstep
1111111.content:
"We want you to play an obese character. You'd have to gain lots of weight both while filming and throughout filming." The man on the other side said. Tom was taken aback. He had heard of people putting on muscle and a bit of fat for movies, but becoming obese was something entire new to him. "What's this film about then? And why do you think I'd be perfect for this. I'm not really fat." Tom asked. "I'm not too sure myself. My boss, the guy who's filming the movie, just told me to get Tom Holland for the lead role," the man said, "I told him to get someone who's already at least chubby, but he wasn't having any of it!" The man went on.

Tom was pretty confused, but thought about how much time this would give him. And maybe the fat would make him less popular, and he could always work off the weight if he needed more money from filming. "You know what? Sure, I'll do it." Tom brashly decided. "Great! My boss is going to be so happy. Oh, and if you want to learn more about the movie you're going to have to ask him." The man said before giving Tom his boss's number and then hanging up.

Tom got up and walked to his full body mirror. He looked at himself and saw how thin he looked, and imagined himself with a big belly, squishy moobs and arms, and even a fuller butt. "This is definitely going to be...interesting." Tom thought to himself. He then decided to...
1111111.title: A Unique Role

choices: A fan discovers Tom, but as it turns out, the fan wants to help him gain weight.
Tom stuffs himself to the brim, but gets impatient, and looks for a faster way.
Tom gets too stuffed, and he starts to question his decision.
11111111.content:
Tom decided that he'd go out to eat and get a head start. After all, he had no money concerns, and he didn't have a whole lot of food at home. He figured he'd eat a lot at the buffet, then go on a grocery run to get stocked up for putting on weight. He never really thought about dieting to gain weight, but now was his time to start. He figured he could always ask questions, but at the same time, he thought it was going to be easy, as he could now eat whatever he wanted and really let himself go.

He wore a hat and sunglasses, hoping to keep a low profile, especially since he didn't want the tabloids to run amock. He hated controversy and drama and wanted to stay fairly well-loved as a celebrity. He also didn't know how much he should keep a secret for the movie. He had a bad habit of letting secrets out, after all, and he wanted to show this new company that he could keep himself from spoiling anything. He was actually quite excited at the opportunity to let himself go, as his only job now was to merely gain weight for his new role.

He headed over to the buffet and had a field day, cramming his plate full of food. He didn't even know if he'd be able to finish the first plate! He started with a couple of pizza slices laying atop a bunch of other food. He sandwiched them together and took a big bite, moaning a bit as he remembered how good junk food was, and that there would be much more of it in his future. He finished the pizza with gusto and moved on to some mac and cheese.

Later...
11111111.title: Getting a head start

choices: To the study and see what was up with that
To the director and find out what 'help' he had
Home and find an easy answer online
111111112.content:
Tom stuffed all of the food he put on his plate into his waiting mouth, going back for seconds and even some thirds. He really had forgotten how good greasy junk food like this was, and how addictive it could be. He made sure not to make too much of a scene, as to not attract negative attention, but just enough to enjoy himself. Luckily nobody noticed him, so his disguise and sneakiness were working.

However, Tom was dismayed at how quickly he felt full. He ate even past that point, however, it wasn't long after that before he felt ready to explode. Tom quickly learned he didn't really have a big appetite, probably thanks to his required diet to stay fit for all the movies he was in. Luckily, that was about to change, but Tom wasn't sure how he would go about doing that. He was getting impatient, and wanted to go through with this movie as quickly as possible.

So, Tom started to think of ideas as he got himself cleaned up. He made sure to wipe anyway any sauce he had on his face or clothes, so he didn't look like he had never eaten before. As he was cleaning up, Tom noticed an ad on the side of his soda cup he was about to toss out. It was for a study related to obesity which was perfect for him. Tom knew these tests were a bit shady though, so he wasn't sure if he wanted to go through with that. He also remembered the director said he would help if necessary, but he wasn't sure he wanted to meet with this strange director so soon. Or he could just look online for answers. Usually a quick Google search was all he needed to answer a question. It was broad but less risky.

As he exited the buffet, Tom decided to go...
111111112.title: To the Brim

choices: Injected Tom with growth hormones to make his stomach bigger and stretchier.
Gave Tom a canister of protein powder designed to build fat to take home and try
Led Tom to a room to "administer the tests"
1111111121.content:
Tom, having already gone down a rabbit hole, decided that he might as well head over to the study. He figured the worst that could happen would be that he wouldn't get results and he'd just have to use one of his other methods. He went to the address on foot, seeing that it was within walking distance. Luckily for him, very few people were out today, so he had very little chances of being recognized. Even his stuffed belly, while enough to be slightly distended, was still hiding well behind his shirt. He let out occasional belches from the digestion and tried to ignore the odd strange look he got from a passerby whenever he belched.

Either way, he managed to get to the right area but had a hard time finding the address number on the buildings. Finally, he looked at a worn-out bronze plaque next to the door of an old brick building, and much to his surprise and good fortune, the number was there, barely legible anymore, but there. He opened the front door skeptically, looking around, only to see an empty hall with dingy, dirty tile, and bare brick exterior walls. Clearly this building was old, and it looked abandoned, but Tom spotted a highlighter yellow piece of paper, with the words "Obesity Study" on it, and an arrow leading to a door. Tom went through the door, going down a half a flight of stairs in a surprisingly well-lit stairwell before following the sign and taking an elevator in the landing below.

The elevator seemed very out of place, being made of immaculate stainless steel and looking new and clean on the inside. Tom pressed the only button on the elevator, and he felt it go down for what felt like forever. Finally, he reached the bottom floor, only to see what looked like the waiting room of a hospital. The lady at the desk smiled warmly and said, "Are you here for the obesity study?" and Tom's eyes lit up as he said, "Yes!", both relieved that he was in the right spot, and at ease in the presence of the nice receptionist. The lady said, "Great! You're the first volunteer to come down here! We really should get a sign for the front door! Please fill out this form real quick, and we can getcha started! Just let me know if you have questions!"

Tom filled out the form fairly quickly. It mostly asked for personal information and contact information, nothing too serious. He handed it back to the lady and she said, "Please head over to the first room on the left!" and she pointed to the hallway, which Tom went down, following the lady's instructions. Tom felt like he was at the doctor's, and when he entered the room, it looked just like a doctor's office! He sat down in one of the chairs and soon, a man in a lab coat walked in and put a pair of gloves on. "We're just going to do a quick physical, Tom! Let's start by getting your height and weight!" the man said as he gestured Tom over to a scale.

Soon enough, Tom was going through a basic physical, with reflex tests, ear, eye, and mouth checks, and he even had to lay down on the bench while the doctor prodded at various parts of his abdomen, asking if anything hurt. Tom belched, explaining that he just ate a bit too much, and the man jokingly said, "Wanted to get a head start, huh?" and soon enough, the doctor said, "Well, you passed the screening, so now it's time for the next step!" and soon the scientist doctor...
1111111121.title: Going to the study

choices: The doctor strapped his arms and legs to the metal surface
Tom felt a prick in his upper arm
The doctor started to squeeze parts of Tom's body to check how fat he was
11111111213.content:
After the doctor explained the screening to Tom, he led him to a separate room. This room was unlike the prior room, which looked welcoming and familiar to Tom. The current room, in contrast, was dark and dimly lit. In fact, many of the lights were turned off. "Sorry about the lighting," The doctor explained, "We're relatively new in town so everything has been settled and established yet. This building is also quite old, if I do believe." Tom wasn't really paying attention to the doctor, and was more creeped out than anything.

There was what looked like several hospital beds, and a metal surface in the middle of the room. Above the table-like surface was a machine that had a few robotic arms as well as a tube, and a sharp, pointy device Tom wasn't sure he could identify. It was like something out of a sci-fi-horror movie. "This way, please." The doctor led Tom to the middle of the room. As they walked through the room, Tom could see large glass canisters nearly three times his size in height and four times as wide in diameter. Nothing was in them, though, so he was unsure of why they were so large. The doctor did say they were still adjusting, though.

Once the two got to the middle of the room, the doctor pulled up a chair next to the metal surface and motioned Tom to lay down on it. Once he Tom did that...
11111111213.title: Administering the Tests

choices: Put a mask on you, and you're gonna smell a funny gas. Just breathe slowly.
Put a needle in your arm, then hook your blood up to a machine for a transfusion
Pull your shirt up and shoot a laser at your stomach. Let me know if it hurts.
111111112131.content:
The doctor started strapping Tom's arms and legs tightly to the metal surface and Tom said, "Wait, what are you doing?" and the doctor said, "I'm restraining you, as we need to keep you still and stable for the procedure, and we're taking every precaution." and Tom got a little nervous, saying, "Can't we do this without the restraints?" and the doctor said, "No. Did you read the consent form?" and Tom blushed a bit in embarrassment before saying, "I might've skimmed it." and the doctor said, "Alright, Tom. On the consent form, it says that we may need to restrain or sedate you for the tests. By signing the form, you agreed to allow us to do it. We will let you go opt-out at any time if you want because we can't have you too nervous either, or it will screw up with the tests. Now, are you willing to continue with the tests or not?"

Tom thought about it for a bit, and he had to admit that he was nervous, especially given how sketchy the room looked, but at the same time, the doctor was giving him a way out, and he could take that way out at any time, so he took a big steadying breath, thinking about the gig, and how he's committed to it now that he quit everything else. He said, "Alright, I'm ready, doc. Let's do this!" and the doctor said, "Good! I'll explain what we're going to be doing first. I'm going to..."
111111112131.title: Strapping Tom down

choices: Swelling with fat
Slowing down, metabolism and all, meaning he was getting lazier
Building up an excess amount of gas and sweat
1111111121311.content:
"I'm going to put a mask on you, and you'll smell a funny gas. Just breathe slowly and everything will be alright." The doctor said with a smile. Tom was glad there weren't going to be any needles or strange, dangerous looking machines used on him. A few seconds after the doctor left, he was back with a mask, and he placed it on Tom's face. It looked like a normal gas mask, so Tom was a bit uncomfortable but he got used to it.

A few seconds after the mask was placed on him, the doctor said, "Alright Tom, I'm turning the gas on now!" Sure enough, Tom could smell a weirdly sweet gas pouring into the mask. He took slow, deep breaths like the doctor had told him to, getting used to the scent after a bit. It actually wasn't that bad, not being too sweet, like a candy store, but not too bold, like the smell of a cake.

However, Tom started to feel a bit drowsy as he smelled the gas. He just thought it was part of the experiment, so he went along with it. After all, he didn't feel pain so he was going to object to this. The doctor, meanwhile, was taking notes and noticed that Tom's body was...
1111111121311.title: Mask: On

choices: Told the doctor about a feeling of pressure in his chest right under his nipples
Awkwardly tried to explain a warm tingling feeling in his junk to the doctor.
Said that he felt fine, and he even asked if he could have more gas.
11111111213111.content:
Tom's body started swelling with fat. Tom himself was unable to look down to see his own body, but he could feel warmth surging through his body, almost like he was going numb, but not quite the same. He merely continued breathing, listening for the doctor to give him any further instructions.

Tom's belly swelled out the most noticeably, creating a bump in his shirt before filling it completely. His chest went from being flat to having a decent set of moobs. His limbs were also thickening, his arms filling his shirt sleeves while his legs, especially his thighs, started filling his pants. Though it was hard to see, Tom's ass was also getting bigger and fatter. This was actually the thing Tom could feel the most, as it started pushing his pelvis up, and he felt a lot of pressure under him. Tom was quite relaxed, and still a little sleepy, though, so he was completely confused by the restraints. He guessed that maybe they would keep him still if something bad happened, but luckily, that didn't seem to be the case.

Just as Tom was about to nod off, he smelled the gas dissipating, and the doctor removed the mask, saying, "The experiment was a success. Take a look at your body!" and the doctor showed Tom some images of himself on the computer. He saw his belly protruding upward from the bench, and he even saw his own face more filled out. He looked down to confirm that his belly was indeed that big. The doctor then said, "How do you feel, Tom? Is everything alright?" and Tom thought about it for a second before he...
11111111213111.title: Fattening gas

choices: Starts to feel sweaty and lets out frequent burps
Noticed he was the only one in the room, and went back to the gas machine
Doesn't feel full, despite eating tons in a few minutes
111111112131113.content:
"I feel fine, actually," Tom said, "Can I have more of the gas actually?" The doctor chuckled before replying with, "Not right now, as we're still testing it. We're not sure if having too much will have unwanted side effects." Tom looked a bit down, but the doctor cheered him up by saying, "Don't worry, it's a good thing you like the gas. We'll let you know when it's available again, and we still have some more tests to do so don't worry!" Tom was glad this wouldn't be the end of his fattening streak, as he knew he needed to get bigger for the movie he was going to be in.

After Tom got adjusted to his slightly bigger size, the doctor led him over to a table in the same room as the gas machine. The table was filled to the brim with tons of fattening and sugary food. There were bags upon bags of greasy fast food, as well as enough deserts and pastries to make an esteemed bakery jealous. "Am I going to have to eat all of this?" Tom motioned to the table. The doctor laughed again before saying, "You catch on quick! Yes, you will, but don't worry, that's what this is for!" The doctor held up a syringe with a yellow-greenish liquid in it. "This is the next test, Tom." The doctor said. He then lifted Tom's sleeve up and quickly injected the liquid into his upper arm. Tom cringed a bit at the sudden pinch, but before he knew it the doctor was cleaning up him with gauze and a band-aid.

"Alright, you can start eating now!" The doctor instructed Tom. Tom promptly sat down and started to scarf down as much food as he could, determined to grow for the movie. As he was eating, Tom...
111111112131113.title: Wanting More

choices: Try inhaling the gas at the highest pressure setting to speed things up.
Try putting the hose up his butt, so he could get gas and eat at the same time.
Play it safe and inhale the gas with the same settings as before.
1111111121311132.content:
Tom noticed that he was the only one in the room. He called out "Hey doc, where'd you go?" but got no response. He smirked and said to himself, "Well if he's gonna leave like that, then I'll just take more of his gas!" and he went over to the gas machine to check it out. The machine was well labeled. There were buttons to turn the gas on and off, and there was a knob to adjust the gas pressure. The knob was to the left of the middle. Tom saw that the hose was spiraled almost like an old phone cord or the hose for an air compressor, and it could extend quite far. He pulled it to the far corner of the room with ease. He then fiddled with the mask, popping it off with a loud click before looking around guiltily. He saw that he didn't attract any attention, so he tried putting the mask back on, hearing it click once again in a satisfying way.

Tom's mind ran rampant with the possibilities of what he could do with the stuff. He was a little worried about the consequences, but he would just blame the doctor for not keeping an eye on him! Tom was impatient, and he wanted to get big enough for this role fast! Either way, his mind was made up, and he was going to...
1111111121311132.title: The only one in the room

choices: He was growing faster thanks to the higher pressure
He was growing at the same rate as before, sadly
He wasn't growing at all so he decided to go eat, forgetting to turn the gas off
11111111213111321.content:
Tom decided to put the gas on the highest pressure setting, hopefully to speed things up. He turned the knob that was labeled 'Pressure' and then checked to see everything else was set. He didn't really see many other buttons or knobs, so Tom just pushed the button to turn the gas on and soon after felt the gas come through. He smelled the sweet gas once again, confirming the fact that it was indeed flowing. Tom walked back to the table of food, the hose supplying the gas easily stretching far enough to allow him to sit. Tom was surprised the hose extended that long, but didn't think much of it.

As he sat back at the table, Tom tried to take deeper breaths to get as much gas in his system as possible. He wasn't sure it would do anything, but he was hopeful it would make him bigger faster. Tom then noticed a flaw in his plan, and that was that he was still hungry. The food was tempting him, but he had no way to eat with the mask on. He just sucked it up for now, and decided to rub his belly in consolation. Tom then realized he could feel himself growing out. It was an odd sensation, but he was enjoying the feeling of growing fatter. It was almost cathartic to relax this much.

Tom had been on the gas for quite a while and he knew he was getting fatter, but he wasn't sure if it was any faster than before. He noticed a mirror and a scale in the corner. Tom didn't have a reference for his weight, so he would have to estimate based on the mirror. When Tom saw his reflection he saw that...
11111111213111321.title: Highest Setting

choices: Leave Tom be and see the results
Confront Tom and turn off the gas
111111112131113213.content:
Tom noticed he wasn't growing, or at least that's what it looked like to him, so he took the mask off again. "Man, I was hoping that would've worked." Tom thought to himself, going back to the table to go eat the food the scientist had set out for him. However, Tom forgot to turn the gas back off, so it was just continuously pouring into the room. Tom didn't think anything of it, as he was distraught he wouldn't be able to grow faster. He was more focused on the food in front of him, taking a big bite out of a burger, as he knew that would put weight on him. In his other hand he had a doughnut, and Tom would take bites out of the opposing treat every other bite.This resulted in a mix of sauce and chocolate on Tom's face and around his mouth, though he didn't really seem to care so long as it made him bigger.

Meanwhile, the scientist who had dealt with Tom was now finally in the observation room, quickly taking notes on his behavior. He wrote down what he ate and how quickly, as to crosscheck it with the experiments later, as well as Tom's weight. He quickly noticed the gas was on, but Tom didn't have it on his face. He wasn't sure what this would do, and he had to admit he was curious about the results. But he didn't want anything bad to happen to Tom, so part of him wanted to go down and fix the situation. Eventually the scientist decided to...
111111112131113213.title: Forgetful

choices: Getting fatter every time he finished a bite.
Lactating, and his moobs were swelling larger and larger.
Sweating a lot more than usual, and he was incredibly gassy as well.
1111111121311132131.content:
The scientist decided to leave Tom alone and see the results of his two experiments mixing, and to see if gas interacted with Tom's body outside of inhalation. He figured that it was too late to reverse anything, so he'd just monitor the situation. He had plenty of solutions for any emergency, and at this rate, if anything bad was going to happen to Tom, then it would happen slowly enough to notice and fix as needed.

Fortunately for the scientist, and for Tom, nothing bad was happening to him, though there was a new side effect that the scientist was monitoring closely. It took a bit for him to even notice it, but he noticed that the effect was getting stronger the longer the gas was turned on, so he knew that it was at least related to the gas somehow. Tom's eating habits didn't seem to be changing over time, and he didn't seem to be getting full, even after eating a lot. The scientist was actually glad that Tom did this because it was giving him more interesting results to study, and he was making discoveries that he'd never have made without Tom's participation. All the while, Tom was oblivious to all of this, eating without really paying attention to what was happening to him.

After the gas had been flooding into the room for a bit, the effect was now quite noticeable. As it turns out the effect that the doctor was noticing was that, Tom was...
1111111121311132131.title: Checking the results

choices: Tom seems a bit off when the doctor sees him
Another side effect reveals itself before the doctor leaves to see Tom
11111111213111321311.content:
Because of all the gas that had poured into the room, Tom was now growing bigger with each bite of food. The young actor didn't seem to notice, but the doctor had and was recording the results. The gains didn't seem to be much at first, but the more gas that was let in the more Tom seemed to gain. The doctor wasn't sure why, but he would be sure to find out after Tom was done with all the food. At first, Tom barely putting on a pound in weight, but now each bite seemed to add 2 pounds to his frame. From what the doctor's readings were showing, Tom gained 10 pounds from just one burger! He wanted to stop the experiment for Tom's sake, but he seemed to want to get fatter anyways. Who was he to stop the actor?

Tom was only halfway done with the table of food, and the doctor decided he would stop Tom when he was finished with all the food. That is, unless something drastic happened. Tom seemed to just keep growing fatter, though, so the doctor figured nothing too bad would happen. The amount of weight Tom gained did increase, but slowly, and enough for the doctor to make sure it wasn't dangerous.

By the time Tom was done with the food, he was gaining around 5 pounds per bite of food, depending on the food and how big the bite was. The doctor then went to check in on Tom and...
11111111213111321311.title: Bigger with Each Bite

choices: His phone was ringing and saw it was his partner who is a secret form the media
He saw a package with the note written, 'To help you relax Tom Holland.'
After he finished his granola bar, he was feeling hungrier
111113.content:
When Tom woke up, he rubbed the sleepy from his eyes. "Well just another day of filming," he said as he got up and got changed. He had to get to the studio soon, so he could only grab a lone donut and some water. He drove off to the studio for anther day of filming.

Tom later arrived to the studio and parked his car. He got to the set where he got into his costume for the film. He had to redo scenes again and again. It was such a pain in the ass. He did try to get something from the snack table, but some crew members told him that he doesn't have time for it. He was getting a little frustrated with this.

After hours of recording scenes, Tom finally had time to rest for a bit as he went outside for a bit of fresh air and got a granola bar to snack on. "Just another day," he said.

Suddenly...
111113.title: Normal day of Filming

choices: Girlfriend
Boyfriend
1111131.content:
Tom heard his cell phone ring. He pulled it out to see the number and smiled. it was his partner he was with for the past year . "Hey babe, nice to hear from you."

"Hey Tommy," his partner replied, "Caught you at the wrong time."

"No, you called at the right time," Tom said, "What's up?"

"Just calling to see if you got the time off like we planned." his partner said.

"Yeah, we will be finishing filming in a few days," Tom assured, "I told the studio that I need time off for a bit."

"Good,because you need time to relax," his partner said, "Hope to see later tonight."

"Yeah, it will nice to see you too. I have to head back to filming," Tom said, "Love you."

"Love you too," his partner replied before hanging up.

Tom smiled as he can't wait to see his...
1111131.title: Tom's Phone call

choices: Tom still felt hungry
Conner went to get cake from the fridge
The last day of filming for Tom
11111312.content:
Tom was lucky to have a boyfriend, people didn't know he was bisexual. He decided that he and his boyfriend should keep their relationship a secret. He didn't want to his boyfriend be harassed by paparazzi. He was lucky that his boyfriend is understanding. "Well back to work," he said.

After another long day of filing, he returned home. He just got through the door and he heard, "Welcome back."

Tom looked up to see a young man with tan skin, blonde hair that was obviously dyed that way, he was taller then Tom, he was 6' 2" tall, and he was quite thin. "Hey Conner," To greeted as the young man walked up to Tom and hugged him,before giving him a kiss.

"How was today's filming?" Conner asked.

"Stressful," Tom said, "Didn't get to eat much today."

Jake T. Austin was going on a long hike after a shoot for Wizards of Waverly Place. He liked hiking in the mountains north of LA, but he hardly had time to hike, and it was rarely ever unsupervised like this! It gave him time to think, and while he enjoyed all the perks that came with being a celebrity, it also came with downsides. He was constantly busy, and had to stick to a strict diet, and it annoyed him sometimes. Sure, he made lots of money, but even so, it didn't give him the freedom to do what he wanted.

Either way, while in the woods higher up in the mountains, he found a strangely perfectly cylindrical granite rock a bit off the trail. It was about as wide around as an end table, and had a perfectly flat top. It was definitely not natural, and looked too perfect to even be man-made, and it was polished and looked brand new, much to his surprise. On top of the granite platform was a gold necklace with a small pendant that looked like a person bowing down. "Whoa, this is really cool!" Jake said to himself as he picked it up and put it on.

Immediately, he felt something surge through him almost like he was struck by lightning, but it wasn't painful, just intense. He dropped to his knees in surprise, and when the sensation was over, he could feel his heart racing. He was amazed, and thought about taking it off, but something compelled him not to, as if he subconsciously knew that he gained a power from this necklace, and he'd need to keep it on to keep that power.

Either way, he decided to hike back down to the trail head. He didn't want his agent, who was waiting at the bottom to worry about him, and his parents would be pissed at both of them if they knew he let him hike alone. He got back in record time, and went back home, thinking nothing of the necklace, but not taking it off either.

It wasn't until his next shoot the next day that he figured out what the amulet's power was. He was a bit cranky when he got up for the shoot, and he said to the director, "Can we not shoot today?" with attitude. Much to his surprise, instead of giving attitude back, the director said, "Of course." before he yelled "Alright everyone, go home! We're cancelling the shoot today!" and Jake said, "Wait really?" and the director said, "That's what you wanted, wasn't it?"

Jake grinned evilly as he discovered this power, quickly surmising that it must've been the amulet. He had to be sure, though, so he said to the director, "Actually, I'm done acting for now. I'll call you if I wanna play Max again." and the director didn't look pissed at all. Instead he merely said, "If that's what you want." and continued to pack his things up. It was confirmed now; Jake had the power to command people to do whatever he wanted them to.

Jake then went up to his producer and said, "Let's go back to my place." and his producer said, "Sounds good, I'm ready when you are!" and Jake grinned from ear to ear, his mind racing as he thought of what he could do with his power. As they left, actors and crew were confused and angry, trying to get an explanation out of the director, who said that it's what Jake wanted, and this answer satisfied them, surprisingly. Why he called so early was an anomaly, as Andy didn't have enough energy to care about it. He wasn't really a morning person, or at least one who got up as early as 7. He knew his parents did, and he even had at one point when he was a child, but now he felt groggy getting up any earlier than 8:30.

Regardless, Andy pulled up to his manager's office, just around the corner of the studio where most of the shows or films he starred in were shot. Andy grumpily got out of his car, still not fully awake, sipping on the last of his coffee as he entered the building. He tossed the coffee cup aside as he waved to the secretary, and they simply waved back since they knew Andy was called in by the manager.

Andy then walked back to his manager's office, knocking once to ensure privacy, and then entered the room afterwards. He was greeted with a, "I'm glad to see you, Andy!" His manager stood up and gave Andy a big bear hug, patting him on the back for extra assurance. "Good to see you too, Sawyer." Andy grumbled out. Though his boss wasn't that big, Andy was so tired that the hug felt tight and strong enough to be a bear hug. He didn't think about it for too long, sitting down quickly after his boss let go.

"Andy. I called you in because of that new role I got you." Sawyer enthusiastically rang. Andy wasn't in the mood for Sawyer's upbeat attitude, and said, "Can you just get to the point? I'm not feeling too well today." "Oh, of course. We're putting you on a new diet for the film." Sawyer explained. Andy looked a little confused, and Sawyer tried to clear the confusion by saying, "It's not really a change, I'd say. More of a, uh, management of your diet. They want you to stay at your current weight for the film. Director said you were the perfect size!" Though it was a roundabout way of keeping him in shape, Andy just nodded. They could've just asked him to exercise more; go for some more jogs, hit the gym up more often, nothing too complicated.

"Well, here's what they want you to eat. Oh, and they want to start as soon as possible so I'd go out and get all of that stuff now. They made sure to transfer enough funds to your bank account, so don't worry." Sawyer explained. While Andy was confused, he was too tired to really question anything so he just thanked Sawyer and left.

After Andy left, Sawyer called the director on his phone. "Hey, Steven? It went perfectly! Yeah, I just made up a lie about the diet. Staying in shape or whatever. He seemed to exhausted to ask about it!" Sawyer paused for a bit, then said, "He has the list, so he should start fattening up whenever he goes to eat his next meal. Yup, glad I could be of service! 111333322222311.content:
Michael Cimino was out and about, trying to take nice walk on a cool, autumn afternoon. He usually didn't get to do this often, as his family and acting career took up more of his life than any recreational activities he participated in. Michael didn't mind, though, as that made the time he got to take a break all the sweeter. Unfortunately, his break time wasn't always, strictly break time. Being a pretty well-known actor meant his personal life and career life usually got mixed together. While that was fine in moderation, sometimes it was too much for Michael.

As he was walking, Michael he was looking down at his phone, texting one of his friends that was pretty busy with college work. He didn't realize someone nearly dropped down once they saw him and ran up to Michael, saying, "Are you Michael Cimino!?" Michael, surprised, nearly dropped his phone, but recovered quickly. He looked up to see that there was a boy almost right in his face. "Ah! Oh, um, sorry. I didn't see you I guess." Michael casually replied. He backed up a bit so he had room to breathe.

"Sorry, I just really like your acting." The boy replied. Michael took this time to size up the boy, since he hadn't been able to before. He was around his height, and he looked like he was around the same age took. He had fairly pale skin, dark brown hair and brown eyes. "So are you actually him? Michael Cimino?" The boy eagerly asked again. "Y-yes. Yeah, that's...my name." Michael said, not really sure how to deal with such an abrasive fan. He was typically fine with a quick autograph or photo, but the fans who got in his face were his least favorite part as an actor. That, and corporate drama, but he was rarely involved in that.

"I really, really, really like your work. I think your amazing!" The fan said, and quickly followed up with, "Do you wanna go out sometime? See a movie? Get dinner?" Michael was taken aback. Here he was, just meeting someone for the first time, and they were already asking him out on a date? "I-I don't think I even know your name." Michael stuttered once again. "Oh! It's Joshua! But you can call me Joshie." The boy named Joshua cooed. To say Michael was a little creeped out was putting it lightly.

"I'm sorry Joshua, but I'm gonna have to decline. I literally know nothing about you." Michael said. "Maybe if you talked to me a bit more before, I would've had a different opinion." He followed up, and then thought, "And weren't if you weren't in my face so much." Joshua looked frozen, like he had stopped functioning. "Uh, are you alright? Rejection isn't the worst thing that-" "But I'm your biggest fan! Please! Just one time?" Joshua pleaded. Michael was further surprised, but said, "I'm sorry, but I don't want to go out with someone I barely know. If you see me again we can try to talk a bit more, but right now you're like a stranger to me." Michael then turned around and started walking away, creeped out by this fan of his.

Joshua's face of joy turned to one of rage, and he shouted, "You'll regret this! I'll have my way, whether you want to or not! You'll be my boyfriend Michael, and then you'll realize how much of a mistake this is!" Michael then walked away at a faster pace, scared of what this guy meant. "Geez, what a lunatic." Michael mumbled as he turned a corner towards his home.

What Michael didn't know was that Joshua was a wizard of sorts. He didn't call himself one, but he was a practitioner of magic, and he was quite good at it too. Not the silly, pull the bunny of the hat magic tricks, but actual, reality changing magic. As he got home in tears, Joshua started a spell. A curse, for Michael. He planned it specifically for Michael, with the eventual goal of having Michael fall madly in love with him. Through the tears, lights, and spell chanting, Joshua set a curse on Michael, with the latter being completely oblivious to it all.

There also was not a lot to do with LA being shut down so Zendaya found herself hanging out and being lazy. She might spend some time laying by the pool working on her tan or reading. Or some time she might spend the day binge watching shows on Netflix. Or other times she might be talking with friends over Skype or her cell phone. Whatever she was doing, she seemed to always have something tasty to snack on. Especially a couple of her favorite treats, Fruity Pebbles cereal and Hagan Daez Coffee Ice cream.

A couple of months of this lifestyle had passed. Zendaya woke up one morning and after using the bathroom, she caught her reflection in her full length mirror. As she gazed at her reflection, she noticed that she didn't look as skinny as she normally did. Her belly while still tan had a small layer of pudge on it. Moving down she noticed her hips seemed a little wider, and her thighs a little thicker and closer together. Her face remained thin and she was a bit disapointed that her boobs hadn't gotten bigger. She then turned around to get a look at her backside where butt was a little bigger and rounder.

After having being critized for being too skinny, it was nice to have a few curves for a change. She had to admit that the extra pounds did look good on her and gave her a more womanly figure. Still, she couldn't help but wonder if maybe she had been eating a little too much.

1223311.content:
Due to the virus shutting down filming on the Cinderella film that she was filming in the UK, Camila Cabello came back to the states and decided to spend the quarantine time with her family in Miami. She was very close to her parents and younger sister so this seemed like a perfect opportunity to spend quality time with them. She was also looking forward to enjoying some downtime.

Today she was laying out by pool in a tight two piece bikini that was a little snug. It showed off her curves, her wide hips, her thick thighs, and her big booty. From the window in the kitchen, Camila's mother looked over her daughter. She was a chubby woman herself and she had been glad to see Camila pack on 15 to 20 pounds over the past couple of years. She always encouraged her daughter to eat what she wanted. Still, she felt like Camila was too skinny. Maybe I can fatten her up some more while she is at home she thought to herself.

Feeling inspired, Camila's mom made her one of her favorite snacks, chicken nuggets. She put the nuggests on a plate and added a little container of ketchup to dunk them in. She also got her a big glass of Mountain Dew Soda. She put the plate and glass on a tray and carried them out to her pop star daughter. Camila was just relaxing and reading a magazine when her mom brought over the snack. "I thought you might be a little hungry hon" her mom said sweetly.

"Ooh, chicken nuggets my favorite. Thanks mom" Camila said as she eagerly picked up one of the nuggets, dunk it in the ketchup, and ate it. This made Camila's mom smile. "Let me know if you want more or anything else"' her mom said before heading back to the kitchen.

Camila loved to eat and once she started eating the nuggets, she couldn't stop. It didn't take her long to finish the plate of nuggets. They left her very thirsty so she quickled gulped down a few sips of her cold and sweet Mountain Dew. A burp escaped her lips and she let out an embarssed little laugh. It was a good thing her boyfriend Shawn Mendes wasn't around to hear her unlady-like burp.

Still feeling a little hungry, Camila decided to take up her mom's offer of having more. She got up and made her way into the kitchen. "Hey mom! Can I have some more nuggets or maybe french fries?" she asked sweetly with her best smile. She held the emply plate in one hand while the other gently patted her soft belly which was a bit bloated at the moment.

info.brief_description: Have your favorite celebrities, male or female, gain weight and get fat!
info.description:
This interactive story will mainly focus on a selected celebrity gaining weight in whatever way you'd like; stuffing, magic, science and any other way you can think of! They can grow as big as you want and however fast you want.

However, there are some rules:

-Other characters other than the selected celebrity can gain, but they must be the same gender as the selected celebrity. For example, a female character cannot gain in a male celebrity's story line, and visa versa for a male with a female celebrity. This is to ensure those who like male weight gain don't have to write female weight gain, and those who like female weight gain don't have to write male weight gain.

-If there are other characters in the story line, the selected celebrity should still be the focus on the story/gain. They don't have to be the biggest or center of attention, however they shouldn't be left out of the story completely.

-Other fetishes, except vore, are allowed, but please make sure they are either an option or you confirm with the person you are writing with that they are okay with going on with said fetish. I'd rather not have people forced into uncomfortable situations

-Try not to end stories unless you think it completely necessary

-Have fun writing! This is for the enjoyment of those writing, so please, enjoy yourselves while reading/writing!
